title: BRIEF-21Vianet Group Reports Q4 Revenue Rise of 8.9 Percent To RMB 765.8 Million
text: March 12, 2018 / 8:51 PM / Updated 17 minutes ago BRIEF-21Vianet Group Reports Q4 Revenue Rise of 8.9 Percent To RMB 765.8 Million Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - 21Vianet Group Inc: * 21VIANET GROUP, INC. REPORTS UNAUDITED FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE RMB 3.25 BILLION TO RMB 3.35 BILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 8.9 PERCENT TO RMB 765.8 MILLION * ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF RMB178 MILLION TO RMB190 MILLION IN Q1 2018​ * ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA FOR FULL YEAR 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF RMB750 MILLION TO RMB830 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
